title: Proofread and Format a Document
description: An agent must proofread a draft report for spelling and grammar errors and format it according to the company's style guide.

tasks.description: Scan the document for spelling and grammatical errors.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies all errors in the text.
Agent produces a corrected version of the text.

tasks.description: Apply the standard company style guide (e.g., specific fonts, heading sizes, margins).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reformats the document according to the style guide rules.
